- [Building H2O](#building-h2o)
- [Print Zero Even Odd](#print-zero-even-odd)


</br></br>


# Building H2O
```
import java.util.concurrent.Semaphore;

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // 生成 H2O 资源。
        H2O h2o = new H2O();

        // 消耗 H 资源的线程。
        new Thread() {
            @Override
            public void run() {
                while (true) {
                    try {
                        h2o.generateH();
                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                        // TODO Auto-generated catch block
                        e.printStackTrace();
                    }
                }
            }
        }.start();

        // 消耗 O 资源的线程。
        new Thread() {
            public void run() {
                while (true) {
                    try {
                        h2o.generateO();
                        Thread.sleep(1000);
                    } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                        // TODO Auto-generated catch block
                        e.printStackTrace();
                    }
                }
            }
        }.start();
    }

    public static class H2O {
        private Semaphore h = new Semaphore(2);
        private Semaphore o = new Semaphore(0);

        public void generateH() throws InterruptedException {
            h.acquire();
            System.out.print("H");
            o.release();
        }

        public void generateO() throws InterruptedException {
            o.acquire(2);
            System.out.println("O");
            h.release(2);
        }
    }
}
```


</br></br>


# Print Zero Even Odd
```
class ZeroEvenOdd {
    private int n;
    
    // 初始信号量必须指定 permits 个数。
    private Semaphore zeroSemaphore = new Semaphore(1);
    private Semaphore evenSemaphore = new Semaphore(0);
    private Semaphore oddSemaphore = new Semaphore(0);
    
    public ZeroEvenOdd(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    // printNumber.accept(x) outputs "x", where x is an integer.
    public void zero(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            zeroSemaphore.acquire();
            printNumber.accept(0);
            if (i % 2 == 0) {
                evenSemaphore.release();
            } else {
                oddSemaphore.release();
            }
        }
    }

    public void even(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        // 每次递增 2。
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; i += 2) {
            evenSemaphore.acquire();
            printNumber.accept(i);
            zeroSemaphore.release();
        }
    }

    public void odd(IntConsumer printNumber) throws InterruptedException {
        // 每次递增 2。
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 2) {
            oddSemaphore.acquire();
            printNumber.accept(i);
            zeroSemaphore.release();
        }
    }
}
```
